verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> which came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H5018>Nebuzaradan<s%> the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> had let him <S%H7971>go<s%> from <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, when he had <S%H3947>taken<s%> him being <S%H631>bound<s%> in <S%H246>chains<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> all the <S%H1546>captives<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, that were carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> unto <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

And the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>him<s%>, Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> this <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon this <S%H4725>place<s%>;

and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>, and done according as he <S%H1696>spake<s%>: because ye have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, therefore this thing is come upon <S%H1697>you<s%>.

And <S%H6605>now<s%>, behold, I loose thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H246>chains<s%> which are upon thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>. If it seem <S%H2896>good<s%> unto thee to <S%H935>come<s%> with me into <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H935>come<s%>, and I will look <S%H7760>well<s%> unto <S%H7489>thee<s%>; but if it seem ill unto thee to <S%H935>come<s%> with me into <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H2308>forbear<s%>: <S%H7200>behold<s%>, all the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H413>thee<s%>; whither it seemeth <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> unto thee to <S%H3212>go<s%>, thither <S%H3212>go<s%>.

Now while he was not yet gone <S%H7725>back<s%>, Go <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H1436>then<s%>, said he, to Gedaliah the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> hath made <S%H6485>governor<s%> over the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with him <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>; or <S%H3212>go<s%> wheresoever it seemeth <S%H3477>right<s%> unto thee to <S%H3212>go<s%>. So the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H737>victuals<s%> and a <S%H4864>present<s%>, and let him <S%H7971>go<s%>.

Then <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> unto <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> with him <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H7604>left<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

Now when all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> that were in the <S%H7704>fields<s%>, even they and their <S%H582>men<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had made <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> <S%H6485>governor<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, and had <S%H6485>committed<s%> unto him <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H802>women<s%>, and <S%H2945>children<s%>, and of the <S%H1803>poorest<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, of them that were not carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>;

then they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%>, to <S%H3458>wit<s%>, Ishmael the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%>, and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8576>Tanhumeth<s%>, and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5778>Ephai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite<s%>, and <S%H3153>Jezaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H4602>Maacathite<s%>, they and their <S%H582>men<s%>.

And <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto them and to their <S%H582>men<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>: dwell <S%H3427>in<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and it shall be well with <S%H3190>you<s%>.

As for <S%H3427>me<s%>, behold, I will dwell at <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>, to <S%H5975>stand<s%> before the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> that shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H622>us<s%>: but ye, gather ye <S%H3196>wine<s%> and summer <S%H7019>fruits<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them in your <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H5892>cities<s%> that ye have <S%H8610>taken<s%>.

Likewise when all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that were in <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and among the children of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and in <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and that were in all the <S%H776>countries<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H5414>left<s%> a <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and that he had <S%H6485>set<s%> over them <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>;

then all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> returned <S%H7725>out<s%> of all <S%H4725>places<s%> whither they were <S%H5080>driven<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%>, unto <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%>, and <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> and summer <S%H7019>fruits<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%>.

Moreover <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> that were in the <S%H7704>fields<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpah<s%>,

and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3045>him<s%>, Dost thou <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H1185>Baalis<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the children of <S%H1121>Ammon<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> to <S%H5221>take<s%> thy <S%H1436>life<s%>? But Gedaliah the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> believed them <S%H539>not<s%>.

Then <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> <S%H5643>secretly<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let me <S%H3212>go<s%>, I pray <S%H5221>thee<s%>, and I will slay <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%>, and no <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H5221>it<s%>: wherefore should he take thy <S%H3064>life<s%>, that all the Jews that are <S%H6908>gathered<s%> unto thee should be <S%H6327>scattered<s%>, and the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>?

But <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, Thou shalt not <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>; for thou <S%H1696>speakest<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>.
